name: @codefee-component/core
description: A Core UI Web Components for Codefee Works. This project is built using Stencil.

scripts.build:angular: cd exports/angular && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:angular:local: npm run build:angular && cd exports/angular/dist && npm pack && cd../../..
scripts.build:react: cd exports/react && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:react:local: npm run build:react && cd exports/react && npm pack && cd../..
scripts.v:patch:all: npm run v:patch:core && npm run v:patch:angular && npm run v:patch:react
scripts.v:patch:angular: node scripts/bumpVersion.js angular patch && npm run sync:angular
scripts.v:patch:react: node scripts/bumpVersion.js react patch && npm run sync:react
scripts.v:minor:all: npm run v:minor:core && npm run v:minor:angular && npm run v:minor:react
scripts.v:minor:angular: node scripts/bumpVersion.js angular minor && npm run sync:angular
scripts.v:minor:react: node scripts/bumpVersion.js react minor && npm run sync:react
scripts.v:major:all: npm run v:major:core && npm run v:major:angular && npm run v:major:react
scripts.v:major:angular: node scripts/bumpVersion.js angular major && npm run sync:angular
scripts.v:major:react: node scripts/bumpVersion.js react major && npm run sync:react
scripts.sync:all: npm run sync:angular && npm run sync:react
scripts.sync:pub:all: npm run build:angular && npm run pub:angular && npm run build:react && npm run pub:react
scripts.postsync:pub:all: git add . && git commit -m "exports version sync"
